text: Adobogiona is the name of several Galatian princesses in the 1st century BC. *Adobogiona, a Galatian queen, daughter of king Deiotarus, spouse of Brogitarus, and mother of Amyntas of Galatia *Adobogiona the Elder, a mistress of king Mithridates VI of Pontus, mother of Mithridates of Pergamon and Adobogiona the Younger *Adobogiona the Younger, an illegitimate daughter of king Mithridates VI of Pontus, mother of Deiotarus Philadelphus, the last king of Paphlagonia
title: Adobogiona (disambiguation)
